ABOUT

Hey! I am Aaishah

A chemist turned Web Developer, with a little bit of experience in Web Development.
My hunger for knowledge and determination to turn information into action
has made me to join Code Your Future.
I hope to get a future that I dream of with this step that I have taken.

I love travelling, listening to the Quran and enjoy good company.
I love to work hard for things that are worth it,
and to be surrounded by those who bring out the best in me.
